alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:19PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Custer and Fall River Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 919 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Edgemont to 9 miles northwest of Montrose. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ardmore and Rumford around 935 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cottonwood Springs Dam, Cascade Falls, Hot Springs, Cold Brook Reservoir and Maverick Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southwestern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
